title_narrative: Cooperation with the International Poverty Reduction Center in China (IPRCC)
description_narrative: SDC’s main objective with this project is to reinforce its collaboration and dialogue with one of China’s most important institution in the field of development cooperation and to strengthen the capacity of the IPRCC to make contributions to the Global Poverty Reduction in the frame of South-South Cooperation. The proposed SDC partnership with the IPRCC will focus on engaging dialogue on development issues that are relevant for both parties and can bring added value to development cooperation in the region and in other regions at a local, regional and global level.
